original_text: But the Israelites had many children, so they grew into a very large family. They became very powerful. They were everywhere in the whole country.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 생육하고 불어나 번성하고 매우 강하여 온 땅에 가득하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites had many children
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 사람들은 많은 자식을 가졌고

sentences.original_text: so they grew into a very large family
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 매우 큰 가족으로 성장했습니다

sentences.original_text: They were everywhere in the whole country
